results.title: Is metformin a geroprotector? A peek into the current clinical and experimental data.
results.text_hl: Additionally, a number of clinical trials prove positive effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@age-related diseases@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@ARD@@@), including @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@ or @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@carcinoma@@@.

citations.NLM: Zajda A, Huttunen KM, Sikora J, Podsiedlik M, Markowicz-Piasecka M. Is metformin a geroprotector? A peek into the current clinical and experimental data. Mech Ageing Dev. 2020 Oct;191():111350. PMID: 32905803
